response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. I understand that its true worth might be subjective and deeply personal to you, but I believe it could significantly impact and enrich your life in ways you might not even imagine. Given the significance of this item, I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a chance to own something truly exceptional without having to explore the uncertainties of the market. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
